add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VSyncFifo.cpp
          VSyncFifo.h
          VSyncFifo__Syms.cpp
          VSyncFifo__Syms.h
  DEPENDS SyncFifo.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SyncFifo.v
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/memory/blockram/dual-port/src/BlockRamDualPort.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VSyncFifo STATIC VSyncFifo.cpp VSyncFifo__Syms.cpp
    SyncFifo.v
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/memory/blockram/dual-port/src/BlockRamDualPort.v
)

target_compile_options(VSyncFifo PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VSyncFifo PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VSyncFifo verilated)
